# create some vectors in R

```{r}
# vectors must contain elements of the same data type

marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

# run this line

marmots

# you end up with a character string because you have multiple types of information under marmots-- you have colors and a number. 

class(marmots)

```

```{r}

pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)
pika
class(pika)


```

```{r}

bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)
bear
class(bear)


```


# Vector Math!
```{r}

ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

# add them

ringtail+fox

# add them

fox-ringtail

# scalar multiplier

100*ringtail

# dot product

ringtail %*% fox





```
